text: Himatanthus stenophyllus is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is native to Colombia, NW Brazil, Guyana, and Suriname.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesWorld Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Himatanthus stenophyllus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
